content.rendered:
Custom 2023 Rose Bowl Travel Packages

Ring in the new year at one of the biggest and most anticipated bowl games of the college season. Our 2023 Rose Bowl travel packages are personalized to include your preferred 2023 Rose Bowl tickets, premium grandstand seating for the Tournament of Roses Parade, your choice of first class accommodations, friendly service from our Roadtrips on-site host, and more. All of our custom Rose Bowl packages are designed to your exact preferences so you can see this historic game exactly the way you want. Complete 2023 Rose Bowl packages available from $3,195 per person, based on double occupancy.

About the 2023 Rose Bowl

The 2023 Rose Bowl will be played on January 2, 2023 in the legendary Rose Bowl Stadium in Pasadena, California. First played in 1902, the Rose Bowl is the oldest Bowl Game and 2023 will mark the 109th time this famed competition has been played. This annual game is usually played on New Year’s Day, except when January 1st falls on a Sunday as it does in 2023.

Experience the beauty of sunny Pasadena, California as it becomes engulfed in roses. The football game may be the highlight of the event, but the city prides itself on putting on one of the greatest spectacles in collegiate sport: the Tournament of Roses Parade. With an incredible display featuring spectacular floats, marching bands, and an electric crowd, Pasadena’s annual celebration is one that is truly extraordinary to experience live.
